reviewText:

Four strong segments feature distinctive looking young women with voluptuous natural bodies, and one of them is the second best session in the entire series: A verbose and convincing good girl performance from curvy campus bookstore preppie KatieMarie (pictured), who unexpectedly dances with naked abandon once her respectability is sold away.

Excellent #3 entry also includes quintessential California girl Melody, whose great smile and bright eyes are captivating even before she the price is reached for eyeball access to her astonishingly hot body. Another blond, Melissa, is not quite as pretty but has equally spectacular natural curves. Finally, the fourth fantastic femme is 19 y.o. Asian Mai Ly, who reluctantly reveals two of the biggest, finest, most all-natural gazongas in the entire franchise.

Even the second tier girls are very good on this edition. Theres Heather, a feisty blond with black streaked hair whose spunky performance would place her higher if not for all her piercings; and Tara, a very pleasant but naive British woman Tara, who has a broad, round British butt, if you like that sort of thing. The only dud to my taste is a bleached blond Jessica, who also turns out to be loaded with tattoos.

A second camera is used here sparingly for a rear view of some of the action, but the bonus section is the best of any volume: Every young womans entire strip and nude dancing segment, shot from behind.

While the original debut video volume in the series has two of the three hottest sessions in the entire franchise, raising its rating considerably, volume 3 has the most consistent collection of beautiful women and several entertaining performances, including the series' second best. You cant go wrong with either #1 or #3, and if this sort of fantasy scenario appeals to you, then you should definitely get both.

Features seven gals who are invited to a photo studio to model.
